Algorithms

Class Ex4Algo

  • java.lang.Object
    • Algorithms.Ex4Algo

  • public class Ex4Algo
extends java.lang.Object
    Author:
    Shai kaikov and sela goldenberg This class hold different Algorithm and function used in Ex4 Most notably the path function we find the shortest path from a player to the nearest fruit

      • isNodeinBox

                                  Coords.LatLonAlt q)

        Parameters:

        q - the point we check
        Returns:

      • GetLine

        public static java.util.LinkedList<Coords.LatLonAlt> GetLine(Coords.LatLonAlt p1,
                                                             Coords.LatLonAlt p2,
                                                             int size)
        a recursive function that Calculate a list of point between p1 and p2
        Parameters:
        p1 - the first point
        p2 - the second point
        size - the number of iteration we want are function to do. size = 5 return about 30 points
        Returns:
        A list of point represnt a line between the 2 points

      • modifiedPoint

        public static Coords.LatLonAlt modifiedPoint(Coords.LatLonAlt box_point,
                                             java.util.ArrayList<Coords.GeoBox> box_list)
        This function Check which corner of the box(Upper left, down right , etc..) our box_point is in and move it a little outside of the box (for exmple if our box point is in the upper left of the box we move it a little bit in the upper left direction)
        Parameters:
        box_point - the point we want the check
        box_list - the list of boxes we need the searched in order to find which box our box point belong
        Returns:
        The Modified point a little outside the box
